entries.meaning: (slang, chiefly US) An eccentric, strange or crazy person.
examples: Synonyms: nutjob, odd duck, weirdo; see also Thesaurus:mad person, Thesaurus:strange person

entries.meaning: (surfing, kiteboarding, wakeboarding) A boardsport participant who lacks style or skill; a newbie who acts as if they are better at the sport than they are.
